mapper.select: select sid, sparentid, sname, scontent, sremark, sflowid, stypeid, stypename, sprocess, sactivity, screatetime, sdistributetime, slastmodifytime, swarningtime, slimittime, sestarttime, sefinishtime, sastarttime, safinishtime, sexecutetime, scpersonid, scpersonname, scdeptid, scdeptname, scognid, scognname, sepersonid, sepersonname, sedeptid, sedeptname, seognid, seognname, slock, sstatusid, sstatusname, skindid, scurl, seurl, sexecutemode, ssequence, scpersoncode, scposid, scposcode, scposname, scdeptcode, scogncode, scfid, sepersoncode, seposid, seposcode, seposname, sedeptcode, seogncode, sefid, sdata1, sdata2, sdata3, sdata4, scfname, sefname, version from sa_task where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sid, sparentid, sname, scontent, sremark, sflowid, stypeid, stypename, sprocess, sactivity, screatetime, sdistributetime, slastmodifytime, swarningtime, slimittime, sestarttime, sefinishtime, sastarttime, safinishtime, sexecutetime, scpersonid, scpersonname, scdeptid, scdeptname, scognid, scognname, sepersonid, sepersonname, sedeptid, sedeptname, seognid, seognname, slock, sstatusid, sstatusname, skindid, scurl, seurl, sexecutemode, ssequence, scpersoncode, scposid, scposcode, scposname, scdeptcode, scogncode, scfid, sepersoncode, seposid, seposcode, seposname, sedeptcode, seogncode, sefid, sdata1, sdata2, sdata3, sdata4, scfname, sefname, version from sa_task
mapper.update: update sa_task set sstatusid='tesCanceled' ,sstatusname='已取消',sexecutetime=now(),sAFinishTime=now(), version=version+1 where (SID != #{taskID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SPARENTID = #{ptaskID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (SACTIVITY = #{beforeActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SFLOWID = #{flowID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SSTATUSID = 'tesReady')

update sa_task set sstatusid='tesFinished' ,sstatusname='已完成',sexecutetime=now(), version=version+1 where SFLOWID = #{flowID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and and (SSTATUSID = 'tesReady' or SSTATUSID = 'tesExecuting')
mapper.select: select sid, sparentid, sname, scontent, sremark, sflowid, stypeid, stypename, sprocess, sactivity, screatetime, sdistributetime, slastmodifytime, swarningtime, slimittime, sestarttime, sefinishtime, sastarttime, safinishtime, sexecutetime, scpersonid, scpersonname, scdeptid, scdeptname, scognid, scognname, sepersonid, sepersonname, sedeptid, sedeptname, seognid, seognname, slock, sstatusid, sstatusname, skindid, scurl, seurl, sexecutemode, ssequence, scpersoncode, scposid, scposcode, scposname, scdeptcode, scogncode, scfid, sepersoncode, seposid, seposcode, seposname, sedeptcode, seogncode, sefid, sdata1, sdata2, sdata3, sdata4, scfname, sefname, version from sa_task where sflowid = #{flowID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sid, sparentid, sname, scontent, sremark, sflowid, stypeid, stypename, sprocess, sactivity, screatetime, sdistributetime, slastmodifytime, swarningtime, slimittime, sestarttime, sefinishtime, sastarttime, safinishtime, sexecutetime, scpersonid, scpersonname, scdeptid, scdeptname, scognid, scognname, sepersonid, sepersonname, sedeptid, sedeptname, seognid, seognname, slock, sstatusid, sstatusname, skindid, scurl, seurl, sexecutemode, ssequence, scpersoncode, scposid, scposcode, scposname, scdeptcode, scogncode, scfid, sepersoncode, seposid, seposcode, seposname, sedeptcode, seogncode, sefid, sdata1, sdata2, sdata3, sdata4, scfname, sefname, version from sa_task where sflowid = #{flowID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sactivity = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SSTATUSID = 'tesFinished' order by SCREATETIME desc

select sid, sparentid, sname, scontent, sremark, sflowid, stypeid, stypename, sprocess, sactivity, screatetime, sdistributetime, slastmodifytime, swarningtime, slimittime, sestarttime, sefinishtime, sastarttime, safinishtime, sexecutetime, scpersonid, scpersonname, scdeptid, scdeptname, scognid, scognname, sepersonid, sepersonname, sedeptid, sedeptname, seognid, seognname, slock, sstatusid, sstatusname, skindid, scurl, seurl, sexecutemode, ssequence, scpersoncode, scposid, scposcode, scposname, scdeptcode, scogncode, scfid, sepersoncode, seposid, seposcode, seposname, sedeptcode, seogncode, sefid, sdata1, sdata2, sdata3, sdata4, scfname, sefname, version from sa_task where sflowid = #{flowID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sactivity = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SID != #{taskID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SSTATUSID = #{statusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by SCREATETIME desc
